mapper.sql: id, creator, create_time, create_date, modifier, modify_time, modify_date, is_delete, auditor, audit_status, type, source, start_time, start_date, end_time, end_date, image, status, match_type, biz_ids, share_reward_limit, share_reward_limit_day, view_reward_limit, view_reward_limit_day, shop_id, activity_name,vender_id
mapper.select:
select
from share_activity where is_delete = 0 and id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.update:
update share_activity
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT},
auditor = #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
type = #{type,jdbcType=BIGINT},
source = #{source,jdbcType=TINYINT},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
match_type = #{matchType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
biz_ids = #{bizIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
share_reward_limit = #{shareRewardLimit,jdbcType=BIGINT},
share_reward_limit_day = #{shareRewardLimitDay,jdbcType=BIGINT},
view_reward_limit = #{viewRewardLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
view_reward_limit_day = #{viewRewardLimitDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_name = #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vender_id = #{venderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT sa.*,sr.reward_person,sr.reward_rule_category,sr.reward_type,sr.prize_quota,sr.prize_quota_day,sr.prize_quota_time,sr.coupon_id from share_activity sa INNER JOIN share_rule sr on sa.id = sr.activity_id where sa.is_delete = 0 and sr.is_delete = 0 and sa.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by sr.reward_person asc

SELECT sa.*,saa.produce_classify,saa.produce_classify_cn,saa.type as activity_type,saa.shop_name from share_activity sa left JOIN share_activity_additional saa on sa.id = saa.activity_id where sa.is_delete = 0 and sa.status !=2 and find_in_set(#sku#,saa.sku)

SELECT sa.*,saa.produce_classify,saa.produce_classify_cn,saa.type as activity_type,saa.shop_name from share_activity sa left JOIN share_activity_additional saa on sa.id = saa.activity_id where sa.is_delete = 0 and sa.status !=2 and find_in_set(#bizId#,sa.biz_ids)
